mapper.select: SELECT CAST(t2.ORDINAL_POSITION AS CHAR) AS serialNo, t2.COLUMN_NAME AS fieldName, t2.DATA_TYPE AS `type`, SUBSTRING(t2.COLUMN_TYPE, locate( "(", t2.COLUMN_TYPE )+ 1, LENGTH( t2.COLUMN_TYPE ) - locate( "(", t2.COLUMN_TYPE )- 1 ) AS `length`, t2.COLUMN_TYPE AS typeAndLen, t2.NUMERIC_PRECISION AS `precision`, t2.NUMERIC_SCALE AS numScale, t2.IS_NULLABLE AS allowEmpty, IF( t2.COLUMN_KEY = 'PRI', 'YES', 'NO' ) AS mainKey, t2.COLUMN_DEFAULT AS defaultVal, t2.COLUMN_COMMENT AS describeInfo FROM `TABLES` t1 INNER JOIN `COLUMNS` t2 ON t2.TABLE_SCHEMA = t1.TABLE_SCHEMA AND t2.TABLE_NAME = t1.TABLE_NAME WHERE t1.TABLE_SCHEMA = #{databaseName} AND t1.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName}

select cast(tab.column_id as varchar) as "serialNo", tab.column_name as "fieldName", tab.data_type AS "type", cast(tab.data_length as varchar) AS "length", tab.data_type || '(' || tab.data_length || ')' AS "typeAndLen", cast(tab.data_precision as varchar) AS "precision", cast(tab.data_scale as varchar) as "numScale", case when tab.nullable = 'N' then '√' else '' end as "allowEmpty", case when indx.constraint_type = 'P' then '主键' when indx.constraint_type = 'U' then '唯一' when indx.constraint_type = 'R' then '外键' when indx.constraint_type = 'C' then '检验' when indx.constraint_type = 'V' then '未知' else '' end as "mainKey", tab.data_default as "defaultVal", colcom.comments as "describeInfo", colcom.comments as "beizhu" from all_tab_columns tab left join user_tab_comments tabcom on tab.table_name = tabcom.table_name left join user_col_comments colcom on tab.table_name = colcom.table_name and tab.column_name = colcom.column_name left join ( select t1.column_name, t1.table_name, t2.constraint_type from user_ind_columns t1 left join user_constraints t2 on t1.index_name = t2.index_name ) indx on tab.table_name = indx.table_name and tab.column_name = indx.column_name where tab.owner = #{databaseName} and tab.table_name = #{tableName} order by column_id;
